title: Tsuritama: Harikitte Contest
title_jp: つり球　オリジナルピクチャードラマ「ハリキってコンテスト」
synopsis: Haru, Yuki, and the boys participate in a competition to decide who will be the next "Prince of the Sea from Endoshima." They just need to show their talents and impress the jury, but everything went in a wrong direction.
